generic: A weathered face tells stories of many journeys taken and hardships endured.
Sharp, observant eyes miss nothing, constantly scanning the surroundings.
Calloused hands speak of years of hard labor and honest work.
A distinctive scar runs across the left cheek, a memento from past conflicts.
Moves with a slight limp, though it doesn't seem to slow them down.
An athletic build suggests regular physical training or demanding work.
Graying hair frames a face that still holds traces of youthful vigor.
A warm smile comes easily, putting others at ease immediately.
Dressed in practical, well-maintained clothing suited for travel.
A stern expression gives away little of what they're thinking.
Fidgets constantly with a small trinket kept in a pocket.
Speaks with a distinct regional accent that's hard to place.
A booming laugh that fills any room when something amuses them.
Carries themselves with the confident posture of someone used to being in charge.
Nervous habits betray an underlying anxiety despite outward composure.

Human: Sun-bronzed skin suggests a life spent mostly outdoors.
A stocky, muscular build developed through years of physical work.
Prematurely gray streaks run through otherwise dark hair.
Laugh lines around the eyes speak of a generally cheerful disposition.
A tall, imposing figure that commands attention when entering a room.
Freckles dust the nose and cheeks from constant sun exposure.
Work-roughened hands with short, practical nails.
A round, friendly face that puts strangers at ease.
Elf: Delicate, angular features give an almost otherworldly appearance.
Luminous eyes that seem to catch and reflect even the faintest light.
Hair like spun silver flows well past the shoulders.
Moves with an effortless grace that seems almost supernatural.
Skin has a faint, ethereal glow in moonlight.
Ears taper to elegant points, adorned with small silver rings.
Ageless features make it impossible to guess their years.
Long, nimble fingers suited for intricate work or music.
Dwarf: A magnificently braided beard adorned with golden clasps and gems.
Broad shoulders and thick arms built for wielding heavy tools.
Deep-set eyes that gleam like polished stones in firelight.
Intricate clan tattoos cover the forearms and shoulders.
A nose that's been broken at least twice and set imperfectly.
Thick, calloused fingers from decades at the forge.
Stocky and solid, built low to the ground like mountain stone.
A booming voice that echoes in enclosed spaces.
Halfling: Bright, curious eyes that seem to notice every detail.
Curly hair that refuses to stay tamed despite best efforts.
Bare feet with impressively tough, leathery soles.
A round, cheerful face that rarely stops smiling.
Quick, nimble movements like a sparrow hopping about.
Laugh lines and crow's feet from a life of good humor.
Small but surprisingly strong hands with deft fingers.
An infectious grin that spreads to everyone nearby.
Tiefling: Curved horns rise from the forehead, polished to a dark shine.
Eyes glow with a faint inner fire, especially in darkness.
A long, sinuous tail swishes unconsciously with mood changes.
Skin has an unusual deep red hue with darker patches.
Sharp canine teeth flash when speaking or smiling.
Clawed fingernails filed to practical but still sharp points.
Faint sulfurous scent that lingers, impossible to wash away.
Shadows seem to cling slightly longer around their form.
